content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Ms. Müller, I'm pleased to meet you. Let's indeed talk about the rental price. I'm sure you'll find my offer quite attractive.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you but but at this moment I'm more focused on finding the most competitive price. I hope we can reach an agreeable amount for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concern, Ms. Müller. How about 1000 euros per month? I assure you, it's a very reasonable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While appreciating your proposal, Mr. Schmidt, I must explore lower options first. Let's continue negotiating to discover a more suitable price for my budget.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Ms. Müller. How about 900 euros per month? This is a considerable discount from my initial offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more appealing. However, let me consider if there's still room for further reduction. I'll get back to you once I've made a decision.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Very well, Ms. Müller. Please take your time to consider. I'll be waiting for your decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your patience, Mr. Schmidt. After careful thought, I accept the rental price of 900 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 900!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [900] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
